recipes.title: Mediterranean Salmon Salad
recipes.description: Fresh herb-crusted salmon over crisp mixed greens with tangy lemon vinaigrette and creamy avocado.
instructions: Preheat oven to 400Â°F and line a baking sheet with parchment paper
Pat salmon fillets dry and brush with 2 tablespoons olive oil
Season salmon with salt, pepper, and fresh dill
Bake salmon for 12-15 minutes until flaky and cooked through
While salmon bakes, wash and dry mixed greens thoroughly
Dice avocado into bite-sized cubes
Halve cherry tomatoes and slice cucumber into rounds
Juice lemons into a small bowl and whisk with remaining olive oil
Let salmon cool for 5 minutes, then flake into large chunks
Arrange mixed greens on serving plates
Top with salmon, avocado, tomatoes, and cucumber
Drizzle with lemon vinaigrette and serve immediately

recipes.title: Spicy Beef Tacos
recipes.description: Perfectly seasoned ground beef in tortillas topped with sharp cheddar, fresh lettuce, and juicy tomatoes.
instructions: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat
Add ground beef and cook, breaking it up with a spoon, for 5-7 minutes until browned
Drain excess fat from the pan
Add taco seasoning packet and stir well
Cook for 2-3 minutes until seasoning is well distributed
While beef cooks, warm tortillas according to package directions
Wash and chop lettuce into thin strips
Dice tomatoes into small cubes
Grate cheddar cheese if not pre-shredded
Fill each taco shell with seasoned beef
Top with lettuce, tomatoes, and cheese
Serve immediately

recipes.title: Hearty Chicken Noodle Soup
recipes.description: Soul-warming broth with tender shredded chicken, tender vegetables, and perfectly cooked egg noodles.
instructions: Place chicken breasts in a large pot and cover with chicken broth
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 20-25 minutes until chicken is cooked through
Remove chicken from pot and set aside to cool, keeping the broth hot
While chicken cools, dice the onion, slice carrots into rounds, and chop celery
Shred the cooled chicken into bite-sized pieces
Add diced vegetables to the hot broth
Bring to a boil and cook for 10-15 minutes until vegetables are tender
Add egg noodles to the pot
Cook according to package directions (usually 6-8 minutes) until noodles are tender
Return shredded chicken to the pot
Stir gently to combine all ingredients
Simmer for 2-3 minutes to heat chicken through
Serve hot
